title: Wolf Hall
creator_credit: Mark Pybus, Joanna Eatwell and Pat Campbell
brief_description: Following the fact-based historical book of the same name, this drama follows the rise of Cromwell as he becomes Henry the VIII’s closest advisor.

constellations_other.name: Royals
constellations_other.description: Royal watchers don't need to visit palaces around the world. There are enough stories about royalty on the silver and small screen to get their fix.

creator_credit_for_label: Mark Pybus, Joanna Eatwell and Pat Campbell
description: Following the fact-based historical book of the same name, this drama follows the rise of Cromwell as he becomes Henry the VIII’s closest advisor. England in the 1520s is a heartbeat from disaster. If the King dies without a male heir, the country could be destroyed by civil war. Henry VIII wants to annul his marriage of twenty years and marry Anne Boleyn. The Pope and most of Europe oppose him. Into this impasse steps Thomas Cromwell: a wholly original man, a charmer, and a bully, both idealist and opportunist, astute in reading people, and implacable in his ambition. But Henry is volatile: one day tender, one day murderous. Cromwell helps him break the opposition, but what will be the price of his triumph?
